title: New Community Events sub board
body:
Hey everyone,

Created this sub board for existing and new events organisers. This is the place to post your existing events or a place to come to for tips on how to run a good event!

Useful links

http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/ - This is the place you go if you are planning a cool event, if its a tournament registering it here and getting it approved will mean we will help you out with some prizing! (Just make sure you read the [FAQ](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/content/faq)
